标题: High visibility reflective safety vest multi pockets Hi-vis vest workwear safety waistcoat with reflective strips
详情: REFLECTIVITY: This safety vest is designed with multiple reflective strips, 2 horizontal and 2 vertical 2-inch wide reflective strips that on the front and back shoulders, chest, waist, and back, which provide 360° protection while you are working under daylight or low light conditions.

标题: High visibility reflective safety vest multi pockets Hi-vis vest workwear safety waistcoat with reflective strips
详情: MATERIALS & MAINTENANCE: The reflective vest is made of 100% polyester, which has high elasticity and tears resistance, while the fabric is light and breathable for comfort. 标题: High visibility reflective safety vest multi pockets Hi-vis vest workwear safety waistcoat with reflective strips
